data.title: First National Tour of Mean Girls in Jacksonville this Weekend

data.text:
FSCI ARTIST SERIES BROADWAY IN JACKSONVILLE

VYSTAR CREDIT UNION PRESENTS MEAN GIRLS

You Know You Wanna Sit With Us...

APRIL 25-30, 2023

JACKSONVILLE CENTER FOR THE PERFORMING ARTS

TICKETS ON SALE

FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 24

Jacksonville, Fla. - The FSC] Artist Series, sponsored by VyStar Credit Union, announced today that single tickets for the First National Tour of Mean Girls- the record-breaking new musical comedy produced by Lorne Michaels, Stuart Thompson, Sonia Friedman, and Paramount Pictures based on the hit film--is coming to the Jacksonville Center for the Performing Arts on April 20 through April 25. Tickets will go on sale Friday, February 24 2023 at 10:00 a.m. and can be purchased here or by calling 904-632-5000.

Mean Girls features a book by nine-time Emmy Award@ winner Tina Fey, based on her screenplay for the film, music by three-time Emmy Award@ winner Jeff Richmond; and lyrics to two-time Tony Awards nominee Nell Benjamin. Tony Award winner Casey Nicholaw directs and choreographs.

Mean Girls opened on Broadway in April 2018 to rave reviews at the August Wilson Theatre, following its world premiere at the National Theatre in Washington. DC. in the fall of 2017. Cady Heron may have grown up on an African savanna, but nothing prepared her for the wild, and vicious ways of her strange new home; suburban Illinois. How will this naive newbie rise to the top of the popularity pecking order? By taking on The Plastics, a trio of lionized frenemies led by the charming but ruthless Regina George. But when Cady devises a plan to end Regina George, she learns the hard way that you can't cross a Queen bee without getting stung.
